Rust语言之道

关注Rust语言新闻、工具、软件包和技术报道等。

How to create the folder in Jekyll!

  • make a new folder
  • create and edit a new listing file news.markdown
  • add the follow code to the file news.markdown
---
layout: page
title: 新闻报道
permalink: /news/
---

<ul>
  {% for item in site.news %}
    <li>
      <h2><a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.name }}</a></h2>
      <h3>{{ item.position }}</h3>
      <p>\{\{ item.content | markdownify \}\}</p>
    </li>
  {% endfor %}
</ul>
  • edit the file _config.yml
  • add the follow code to the file _config.yml
  • create a new artile touch _news/2019-08-26-news.markdown
